--- product_code: ls08 description: 10mm German Kartaunen (Cannons) title: 10mm German Kartaunen (Cannons) breadcrumb: Kartaunen (Cannons) name: German Kartaunen (Cannons) cost: $10.00 paypal_id: R3JJ9CRB9LNFS ---

The Kartaunen fired the second lightest iron ball under the classification system created by Maximilian I. Later, when Charles V rewrote the system, these guns were those with a caliber of 16–18cm.

This is a Kartaunen (Cannons) unit of two cannons and six crew. You will recieve two cannon barrels (ls08a), two gun carriages (ls08b), four reinforced spoked wheels (ls_a) and six crew (a mix of ls15a–i). Bases are not included but are available separately.
